results.name: Number of factorizations of n that are constant or whose distinct factors are pairwise coprime.
comment: First differs from A327400 at A327400(24) = 4, a(24) = 3.
link: Gus Wiseman, Sequences counting and encoding certain classes of multisets
example: The a(90) = 7 factorizations together with the corresponding multiset partitions of {1,2,2,3}:
xref: Partitions whose distinct parts are pairwise coprime are A304709.
Factorizations that are constant or relatively prime are A327400.
results.author: _Gus Wiseman_, Sep 22 2019
